==Translingual==

===Etymology===
Possibly invented in Japan,<ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref> using the {{m|ja|魚}} radical on the left for its meaning of “fish”, and {{m|ja|念}} on the right for its [[phonetic]] value as a homophone of {{m|ja|粘|tr=nen||sticky; slimy}}.
